3.caption_en: A visual framework titled "Loop: Discover & Launch — The Entrepreneurial Discovery of an Impact" that maps the pathway from Initiate through Discover & Launch to a Sustainable Platform. It presents key components and guiding questions—Market, Competition, Monetization, Business, Go-to-Market, Team, Governance, Need & Problem, Solution, Unfair Advantage, and Minimal Viable Platform—to help founders validate, launch and scale an impact-driven platform.
